query:
SELECT id as "id!: Uuid",
                          title,
                          status as "status!: ChatSessionStatus",
                          summary_text,
                          archive_ref,
                          created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                          updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                          archived_at as "archived_at: DateTime<Utc>"
                   FROM chat_sessions
                   WHERE status = $1
                   ORDER BY updated_at DESC
